title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 June 2008 - XWiki
content: WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:02): I need help WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:02): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationOracle WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:03): Isn't this a weird tutorial? WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:03): where's the database and tables creation? vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 00:08): Hi WeOwnAmazonia vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 00:08): you don't need to create anything vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 00:08): anything = tables vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 00:08): you onyl need to create the database as indicated vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 00:09): just have faith you'll see it'll work ;) WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:33): our dba don't know what's grant all to xwiki is supposed to do WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:33): I'm afraid that this gives a complete control on the oracle databases to that user WeOwnAmazonia - (19/06/2008 00:35):  I guess I'll give up from XWiki vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 00:39): g'night folks, see you tomorrow xwikibot - (19/06/2008 00:46): XWiki.vnkatesh was modified by XWiki.vnkatesh - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/vnkatesh xwikibot - (19/06/2008 15:09): vmassol\_, how can i test XWIKI-2487? it requires to modify xwiki.cfg vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:10): amelentev: was sure you were going to ask :) vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:10): we do this already in some functional tests. I think it's done in the ldap tests. vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:10): tmortagne should know amelentev - (19/06/2008 15:12): we can use editcomment\_hidden field in XWikiPreference class vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:15): it's better if it's done directly from the config tmortagne - (19/06/2008 15:15): in ldap test I modify xwiki.cfg before starting the server vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:15): I think we have an api in XWiki class vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:15): to reload the config vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:15): actually even better vmassol\_ - (19/06/2008 15:15): there's a setter I think continuum - (19/06/2008 15:17): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Platform - Core - Core http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=30861&projectId=195
